source: TEXT_STMBDZ205_02677_SEQ_00<tab>Hayama appears to be deeply engrossed in surveying the seas.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ205_02677_SEQ_00<tab>紅玉台場のハヤマは、怯えているようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ205_02677_TODO_00<tab>Survey the designated spots and slay the ominous onibi.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ205_02677_TODO_00<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA51A01 /var>で見渡して<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F216ED01 /var>が現れたら討伐

source: TEXT_STMBDZ205_02677_HAYAMA_000_000<tab>Kami above! Y-You can't just sneak up on someone like that! Now, what is it you need? If you do not require anything, I ask that you kindly allow me to return to watch du─
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ205_02677_HAYAMA_000_000<tab>ヒイッ！
い、いきなり話しかけるんじゃない！
こちとら見張りという大切な務めを果たしているんだぞって……

source: TEXT_STMBDZ205_02677_HAYAMA_000_001<tab>Ah─at second glance, you appear to be far stronger than the average <var 09 E948 ((Hyur)) ((Elezen)) ((Lalafell)) ((Miqo'te)) ((Roegadyn)) ((Au Ra)) ((Hrothgar)) ((Viera)) /var>. Perhaps there is something you can help me with. Lately we've been seeing eerie flashing lights along the eastern coast of Sakazuki.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ205_02677_HAYAMA_000_001<tab>むむっ、よく見れば腕が立ちそうだな。
実に好都合だ、貴様……サカズキ島の東の浜まで行って、
「不気味な鬼火」の正体を確かめて来い！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ205_02677_HAYAMA_000_002<tab>I-It is probably just the ships passing though this area but some of the men here are convinced it is an onibi. They are terrified. Would you go and have a look for us?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ205_02677_HAYAMA_000_002<tab>どうせ、船の灯りか漁り火を見て勘違いしただけだろうが、
海で死んだ死者の霊だ何だと怖がる者もいて、困っておるのだ。
俺には防人として台場を護る使命がある故、持ち場を離れられん。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ205_02677_HAYAMA_000_003<tab>The lights were last spotted to the northwest of here. If it turns out to be an onibi, after all, please see that it is dispatched. I-I would go and take care of it myself, of course, but I simply cannot leave my post here.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ205_02677_HAYAMA_000_003<tab>そこで貴様の出番だ。
噂では、ここから北西のあたりで鬼火を見た者がいるらしい……。
もしも、本当にいた場合は、討伐しておくように！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ205_02677_HAYAMA_000_004<tab>To the northwest of here is where the lights were last spotted. Please go there and, if there truly is an onibi, see that it is dispatched.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ205_02677_HAYAMA_000_004<tab>噂では、ここから北西のほうで、鬼火を見た者がいるらしい……。
もしも、本当にいた場合は、討伐しておくように！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ205_02677_SYSTEM_000_009<tab>Try as you might, you do not spot any ominous onibi.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ205_02677_SYSTEM_000_009<tab>このあたりでは、鬼火が見あたらないようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ205_02677_HAYAMA_000_010<tab>So you mean to say there was no onibi─only tiny little fire sprites?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ205_02677_HAYAMA_000_010<tab>……なに、不気味な鬼火の正体は、
ちっぽけな焔の精だったと？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ205_02677_HAYAMA_000_011<tab>Hahahaha! I cannot wait to reveal the news to the others. They will feel so foolish for being frightened!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ205_02677_HAYAMA_000_011<tab>ハッハッハ！　そんなことだろうと思っておったわ。
海の魔物など、何するものぞ！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ205_02677_HAYAMA_000_012<tab>A reward, you say? Is the act of doing a kind deed for a fellow man not reward enough? Hahaha! I am just joking, of course. Here you go!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ205_02677_HAYAMA_000_012<tab>報酬？　まったく、使命を持たぬものはこれだからな。
だが俺は今、すこぶる機嫌がよい。
とっておくがよいわ！　ハーッハッハッハ！
